project.name: Split Screen Review - Stable Splits - scope to confocalStacks

property.name: errorMessage
property.value: Class must be 'TI' when Data Set is ${Data Set}.

property.name: errorMessage
property.value: Class should not be set for Data Set ${Data Set}.

property.name: errorMessage
property.value: Stable split lines must start with '(BJD|GMR|JRC)_S[LS]', 'EXT', 'GMR_OL', or 'GMR_MB'.
